title: The beauty of human skin in every color
description: Angélica Dass's photography challenges how we think about skin color and ethnic identity. In this personal talk, hear about the inspiration behind her portrait project, Humanæ, and her pursuit to document humanity's true colors rather than the untrue white, red, black and yellow associated with race.
author: Angélica Dass
keywords: TED, talks, beauty, Brazil, art, community, culture, creativity, design, global issues, identity, humanity, race, Slavery, social change, society, visualizations, photography, diversity
